Articles.Content: I\'m trying to take of from the runway with a spaceplane and go to the mun and back without ejecting any parts. Is it possible? maybe. I\'ve made it to the mun with my current design but not back. If i was a better pilot I think it could be done. I would like to see if anyone can do it. I\'ve attached my current design. maybe someone can do it with my craft or their own. Post any comments or achievements please.
to orbit and back? been there done that. lol my challenged is to the mun and back.

to orbit and back? been there done that. lol my challenged is to the mun and back.

If you look through that thread, people have already done that as well; most notably this guy: Kerbin orbit, MÃ¼n landing, Minmus landing, then back to Kerbin, all without parts being shed.
